mapper.select: select ec.id,ec.cover,ec.title,ec.lesson_num as lessonNum,ec.price,et.`name` as teacherName,es.title as subjectOne,es2.title as subjectTwo from edu_course ec left outer join edu_course_description ecd on ec.id=ecd.id left outer join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id=et.id left outer join edu_subject es on ec.subject_parent_id=es.id left outer join edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_id=es2.id where ec.id=#{id} /*${id}:拼接导致sql注入*/
